Product Description

Neat Little Holder!

This car seat gap organizer box can help you become a neat holder!

Look No Further For Your Keys！

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

High Quality

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Look No Further For Your Keys

Adds CONVENIENCE & SPACE for your keys, cards, money, charger, phone, and cosmetics，receipts. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Intimate Settings

These car gap filler organizers can make it easier for you to find the ‘car items’ you need on the road. The precise fit of the design transforms the organizer into several high boxes with storage compartments. Make your Armrest console organized and looks much cleaner.

Easy To Install

These car seat gap fillers with cup holders can be easily washed with water. Besides, the installation is relatively simple, no tools required, installation car seat gap filler just inserts the between car seat gap filler and console, Can find a suitable position.

Specification:

Product Color: Black Main Material: Flocking materials, PU Leather, and ABS Plastic Suitable: Not was suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.6 inches(1.5 cm) and central console lower than the seat. Package size (L*W*H): 11.22in x 6.92in x 4.17in Product Weight: 1.91lb Package Content: 1 x Left Storage box 1 x Right Storage box 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth 2 x Car Back Seat Headrest Hooks

Say Goodbye to Mess – If you have problems on losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat gap filler is for you. It prevents small items from falling between the car seat gap, gives you a place to put change, pens, toll cards, and other necessary ‘car items’ and keeps them within reach.
New Version Car Seat Gap Filler – This car seat organizer has a good texture that feels like a baby’s skin that is fine and smooth. The car storage organizer front seat is made of high-quality black ABS plastic and PU leather that cannot break, slip, bend or leave any scratches. With a velvet material pads that can prevent items from sliding and rattling.
Fashion Design and Driving Safety – This front seat gap filler will help you create a neat and clean environment. This seat gap filler fits the car seat gaps. Because it will not shake when you brake suddenly, and it is not too big to waste your car seat space. The new design added red stitching which adds to the overall appearance. Make your car more outstanding among friends.
Perfect Size Car Storage Organizer- Not suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.78 inches(2 cm) and central console lower than the seat. The size of the car seat gap organizer is 10.23 x 6.49 x 2.95 inches which is suitable for most vehicles. The cup holder can fit cups up to 2.75 inches in diameter. Just like the size of aluminum Coca-Cola. Please measure the distance between your seat and the console carefully before you purchase.
Excellent Service – 2 car seat back hooks and 1 microfiber cleaning cloth as the gift. We provide one year of free replacement of this car seat gap filler with cup holder and 6 months of quality assurance. Please rest assured to buy. If you are not 100% satisfied with your order, please email us directly, we promise to provide every customer with quality products and services.

【Easy to Install】: The mixed adhesive is very sticky but does not leave marks, please pay attention to clean the rearview mirror before sticking and installing it when it is dry and dust free.
【Safe Driving】: Rain and heavy snow can blur the rearview mirror and thus interfere with your driving vision. Installing rain eyebrows can effectively block the interference of rain and snow, provide a clear vision and improve the safety of driving on rainy days.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:37 UTC – Details)

From the brand

EcoNour Side Window Sunshades!

EcoNour Car Window Shades are designed to offer superior sun protection with no compromise to the drivers as well as the passengers!

About Us!

EcoNour is mainly focused on providing premium quality products that last longer to keep your kids safe from hot sun rays.From Sunshades to other car accessories, our products enhance the way you live your life.Our products are designed in New Jersey, USA!

Complete Car Care Solution

How did we get our start?

Started back in 2015 as a small, family-owned business from New Jersey, we strive to provide you the best and only the best!

What makes our products unique?

Our premium materials and long-lasting endurance are what make us stand out from the competition!

Why do we love what we do?

EcoNour will always stay within its core values of selling quality products to help people’s lives transform a bit better!

Absolute Sun Protection: EcoNour Car Window Sunshades protect your infants and pets from harmful UV rays and act as a sun blocker that provides great SPF protection. Featuring a size of 20 x 12 inches, it offers excellent sun protection.
Unique Dual Layer Design: EcoNour’s Window Shades are constructed with a dual-layer, 120 GSM mesh fabric for Semi-Transparent and 80 GSM mesh for Transparent, ensuring superior UVA and UVB ray protection.
No More Suction Cups: Our baby window shades are designed to adhere to car windows effectively, leaving no residue behind after removal thanks to the “Static Cling Technology.” It also gives your car an aesthetically pleasing look!
Hassle-Free Installation: EcoNour’s Car Window Shade can be installed in a few seconds. Roll up and clean the car windows using a damp cloth and stick the rear window shades to the glass.
Fits Most Car Windows: Our Car Shield Sun Protector for side windows fits most cars and SUVs. You can also overlap the sunshades for better coverage. Please note that the shade cannot be used when your windows are rolled down.

Have you ever had the feeling as if you’re inside an oven while your car ride? Is the hot sun making your car ride uncomfortable every day? Are you actively looking out for a permanent solution to avoid the sun rays from attacking you inside your car? Well, we have an ideal solution for all your car interior problems due to the burning sun.

EcoNour Car Window Sun Shade offers you exceptional protection from the hot sun, effectively blocking out all the UV rays and other harmful sun rays, with ease. Made out of durable 80 GSM for Transparent and 120GSM mesh for Semi-Transparent material along with 18S Static Film, EcoNour Car Side, and Rear Window Shade is a great solution to all the problems that occurred in the sun to your car and to your loved ones during the car ride.

NEVER WORRY ABOUT THE SUN’S HEAT!

  • Complete protection from the sun: EcoNour Car Window Shade for Side and Rear Window sun protection helps in blocking the sunlight without any issues, keeping you and your passengers safe from the sun.
  • Convenient to use: You can easily paste the EcoNour Car Window Shade without any hassles and remove the shade without leaving any residue or a mark.
  • Effective Transparency: EcoNour Windshield Sunshade’s transparent layer helps in the viewpoint of the exterior world without compromising on the sunray from entering inside the car.

The 80 GSM mesh allows a smooth transparent view when installed on your car windows without any compromise in sun protection. The 120 GSM Mesh is used in the semi-transparent variants of the sunshades which can darken the effects of sunlight and protects you from the UV Rays. The 18S Static cling can come in handy for increased suction endurance when compared to the conventional 15S cling which is used by others.

  • Dual-Layer Design: Our window shade features an excellent, dual-layer design that gives the best of both material usage, the 18S Film and 80&120 GSM Mesh.
  • Transparent Material: EcoNour’s Window Sunshade comes with two identical transparent shades that offer great deflection from the Sun Rays in an effortless manner.
  • Toughened built materials: Compared with the other window shades, our sunshades can stick long and offers immensely superior durability.
  • Enhanced Elasticity: The increased elasticity on the EcoNour Sunshade can ensure you a stronger contraction and sturdiness with ease.

NO SUCTION CUPS AND NO RESIDUE!

No residue!

EcoNour Side Window Shades stick to your car’s window without adhesive, glues, or suction cups and do not leave any residue on your car window.

No Suction Cups!

Before installing, clean the window with the given cloth and place the Window Sunshade inside your car window. It will stick firmly!

Perfect Protection and Visibility!

Semi-Transparent shade is highly recommended for rear seats for better shading effects. Transparent shades are transparent enough to provide a full range of vision on the road. You can combine both shades to get different results!

Read more

Confused on how to fold? No problem!

BRINGS DOWN THE CAR TEMPERATURE

Using the EcoNour Car Sunshade enhances your car’s fuel efficiency by reducing the vehicle’s load on the AC system during hot summer times.

MADE TO LAST LONG

EcoNour Window Sunshades are incredibly durable along with the 80 & 120GSM mesh which is naturally robust, makes it last longer, and performs well in the long run.

Not just car windows, you can use the EcoNour Window Shades pretty much anywhere in your day-to-day routine. From home windows to reducing the glare while working from home to using them to protect your kids from the sunlight, the possibilities are quite endless!

4
Price: $25.99 - $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:37 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Sticky note boards

Material: acrylic

Color: Transparent

Size: 11×3.1×0.05 inch

Weight: 145g

Package includes: 4 Sticky note boards

High Quality Materials

Computer monitor message board made of clear acrylic material, stylish, durable, easy to paste, record important things and to-dos, make your life more organized and convenient.

Concise Beautiful

The computer message board is clear and transparent, simple and beautiful, keeping the desktop clean, and brings more fun to the office.

Easy To Remove

Multifunction computer monitor memo board, easy to remove, will not damage your monitor or leave unsightly marks when removed.

1.Tear off the surface protective film before use.

2.Remove the self-adhesive tape

3. Paste the memo board to the computer.

Warm Tips:

Please stick the computer memo board on the frame of your computer instead of the computer screen to avoid damaging your screen.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Monitor memo board is made of acrylic material, which is simple and stylish, light weight, easy to use, durable, not easy to fall off or break. Note: Please stick the memo message board on the computer frame instead of the computer screen to avoid damage to the screen.
PRODUCT SIZE: Computer monitors message board size is 11×3.1×0.05inch, suitable for most computer monitor. Note holder for monitor simply peels off the sticker and hang it over the edge of the monitor screen of either side to use.
HOW TO USE: You need to tears off the computer side panel memo surface protective film, wipe the dust on the edge of the computer monitor, and stick the board to the right or left side of tape, and you’re done.
EASY STORAGE: Monitor memo is easy to use, you can stick a memo on the message board to record important things and to-dos to prevent forgetting. Memo board for office easy to store, make your life more organized and more convenient to use.
WIDE APPLICATION: Computer monitor side panel is suitable for home, office, bringing convenience to your life. Multifunction computer monitor memo board to meet your daily needs in the office and at home, never forget what you want to do, and bring you a good experience.
